Public Member Functions

(WNRequestTicket *) - wordResponseWithWord:listener:
 Perform an asynchronous lookup of the provided word, providing the WNWordResult to the given WNWordDataSourceListener.

Detailed Description

A generic asynchronous data source for performing wordnik lookups.

Note:
Implementing this API requires a block-compatible compiler, available in iOS 4.0 or later.
